title: Behind the Scenes Minis: Friedrich and the Greensboro Sit-ins
itunes:title: Behind the Scenes Minis: Friedrich and the Greensboro Sit-ins
description:
Holly and Tracy discuss one of Caspar David Friedrich's paintings that wasn't part of the episode on him. They also discuss Tracy's experience in school not including the Greensboro sit-ins, and how that Woolworth's has become a museum.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
